snippet: Neil Gaiman discusses the stuff of nightmares and his upcoming appearance at Carnegie Hall, where on June 27 he will give a reading with a live score by the FourPlay string quartet.
abstract: Excerpts from interview with author Neil Gaiman, who discusses legends that inspire his stories and upcoming performance at Carnegie Hall, where he will read from his novella The Truth Is a Cave in the Black Mountains.
lead_paragraph: Neil Gaiman discusses the stuff of nightmares and his upcoming appearance at Carnegie Hall, where on June 27 he will give a reading with a live score by the FourPlay string quartet.
